Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to publish agents to WhatsApp in Copilot Studio. This feature will reach general availability on July 31, 2025.

How does this affect me?
The WhatsApp channel will be made available in Copilot Studio. When publishing an agent to WhatsApp, Copilot Studio fetches your WhatsApp configuration from Azure Communication Services and lets you choose where your agent should appear.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required. If you would like more information on this feature, please visit the Publish agents to WhatsApp article.

Title: Microsoft Copilot Studio â€“ Publish agents to WhatsApp
